name: Starfall Island
description:
You’re a star that fell from the night sky, coincidentally on Starfall Island.

The island is populated with a bunch of different types of animals, and you can understand them through *star magic*.

To get back into the sky, you need to fire yourself from the cannon at Pete's Emporium (the local shop). The store owner says you can use the cannon if you give him a pearl for his daughter’s wedding.

Quest chain time! There are different people, with different wants and needs, all around Starfall Island. Help them with their problems, and trade items around to get the pearl you need.

Have fun!

-Kio

Made with Bitsy.
